com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2LightProjectiveReadableType, R2LightProjectiveType, R2LightProjectiveUsableType, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowReadableType, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowType, R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowWritableType, R2LightProjectiveWritableType, R2LightReadableType, R2LightSingleReadableType, R2LightSingleType, R2LightSingleWritableType, R2LightVolumeSingleReadableType, R2LightVolumeSingleType, R2LightVolumeSingleWritableType, R2LightWritableType

    public final class R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadow
extends Object
implements R2LightProjectiveWithoutShadowType
    Parameters for simple projective lights that operate by rendering frustum meshes.
